lyrics:
[Verse 1: Mercedes]
When I was a little girl, I had a rag doll
Only doll I've ever owned
[Verse 1: Santana]
Now I love you just the way I loved that rag doll
But only now my love has grown

[Pre-Chorus 1: Mercedes]
And it gets stronger in every way
[Pre-Chorus 1: Mercedes & Santana]
And it gets deeper, let me say
And it gets higher, day by day

[Chorus: Mercedes & Santana]
Do I love you, my oh my?
River deep, mountain high, yeah yeah yeah
If I lost you, would I cry?
Oh, how I love you, baby, baby baby baby!

[Verse 2: Santana]
When you were a young boy, did you have a puppy
That always followed you around?
[Verse 2: Mercedes]
Well, I'm gonna be as faithful as that puppy
[Verse 2: Mercedes & Santana]
No, I'll never let you down

[Pre-Chorus 2: Santana]
Cause it grows stronger like a river flows

[Pre-Chorus 2: Mercedes & Santana]
And it gets bigger, baby, and heaven knows
And it gets sweeter, baby, as it grows

[Chorus: Mercedes & Santana]
Do I love you, my oh my?
River deep, mountain high, yeah yeah yeah
If I lost you, would I cry?
Oh, how I love you, baby, baby baby baby

[Verse 3: Mercedes]
I love you, baby, like a flower loves the spring
[Verse 3: Santana]
And I love you, baby, like the robin loves to sing
[Verse 3: Mercedes]
And I love you, baby, like a schoolboy loves his pet
[Verse 3: Mercedes & Santana]
And I love you, baby, river deep, mountain high

Oh baby
Oh baby
Ohhh baby, ohhh yeah
Yeah...

[Chorus: Mercedes & Santana]
Do I love you, my oh my?
River deep, mountain high, yeah yeah yeah
If I lost you, would I cry?
Oh, how I love you, baby, baby baby baby
